talents.title: R&D Records Label
talents.subtitle: The artistic laboratory where Musical excellence meets the stage.

intro.p1: R&D Records is the label of Seder Music — a house designed to reveal artists, build strong identities, and produce tracks that last.
intro.p2: At the crossroads of the artistic and the strategic, we support every project from A to Z: artistic direction, production, recording, mix & mastering, distribution, and marketing deployment. Our signature: premium sound standards, a clear vision, and teamwork dedicated to emotion.
intro.p3: R&D Records is also dedicated to established artists with a strong identity and a growing audience. We provide them with comprehensive, hands-on support: promotional strategy, exposure, opportunity creation, and—crucially—representation with the right partners (producers, organizers, brands, media, venues, and events).
intro.welcome: Welcome to R&D Records — where talent becomes a project… and the project, a success.

graines.title: Seeds of Talent
graines.desc: Are you a young talent looking to join the R&D Records family?
graines.full_text: We scout and propel the next generation of music. R&D Records provides comprehensive, bespoke support.

artistes.title: Artists
artistes.desc: Are you already an artist looking to benefit from management representation for your bookings?
artistes.full_text: We take care of your visual production, the organization of your concerts, and your events.
bullets: Organization of dedicated concerts and events

billetterie.hero_subtitle: Manage your events from A to Z.

blog.hero_subtitle: The latest from the Seder universe.

agency.vision_text: Seder Music is an event and booking agency dedicated to those seeking artistic excellence for high-profile events: weddings, galas, private parties, corporate events, brand partnerships, concerts, and bespoke productions. We represent and book renowned artists, headliners, and premium performances—with a comprehensive approach: artist selection, negotiation, logistics, coordination, and artistic support right up to the big day. Our goal is simple: to create a memorable event with impeccable performance and a seamless experience for the organizer. Beyond booking, Seder Music also supports brands and projects in artistic influencer marketing: strategic networking, campaign creation, and visibility through artists perfectly suited to the brand image and target audience. And because a great agency doesn't just book stars, we've also developed an in-house label: R&D Records. Through it, we sign, manage, and develop emerging artists and up-and-coming talents, whom we train, structure, and propel—even integrating some of them into major venues and Seder Music's opportunities. In short: Seder Music orchestrates the high level (stars & events), and R&D Records builds the future (new talent & artistic development)—all within the same ecosystem, with a single requirement: quality.
agency.leadership_bio: From musical direction to technical execution, we accompany the most demanding institutions in creating immersive experiences. Our international network allows us to break boundaries: inviting the exceptional to Israel, and bringing Israeli excellence to global stages.
agency.signature: Operational excellence in the service of radical emotion.

production.hero_subtitle: When Seder Music's vision meets the organization of Seder Events.
production.synergy_text: For every major production, Seder Music mobilizes the expertise of Seder Events. Our clients gain access to a universe of prestigious services, complex logistics, and international coordination.
production.uhnwi_text: Every gala, every concert is treated with the standards of the most demanding private concierge services.
production.signature: Seder Group: One signature, total mastery.

booking.hero_subtitle: World-renowned Singers, Musicians, and DJs for your stages.
booking.core_text: We support brands, institutions, and private clients who want to bring in renowned artists. From talent selection to the final show, we orchestrate the entire event. We define your requirements, confirm the artist, negotiate the terms, secure contractual commitments, and then manage the production and all the logistics related to the performance, from travel and accommodation to technical coordination and rider support. You have a single point of contact for a seamless experience and a result that lives up to the hype.
booking.wow_fact: The promise of pure emotion, from the first note to the final encore.

talents.title: R&D Records
talents.subtitle: From creative spark to global stage. We develop talents and produce musical excellence.

graines.title: Talent Development
graines.desc: We scout and propel the new generation of Mediterranean and Oriental music.
graines.full_text: R&D Records provides global and bespoke support: from studio production to image coaching, music videos, and social media management. Our team puts its expertise at the service of your takeoff.
bullets: Booking on our events and concerts

artistes.title: Artists
artistes.desc: Are you already an artist looking to benefit from management representation for your bookings?
artistes.full_text: We take care of your visual production, the organization of your concerts, and your events. 360° management for your career.
bullets: Organization of dedicated concerts and events

who.title: For Whom?
who.text: We are not just looking for voices, we are looking for signatures. Singers, solo musicians, composers: if you have raw talent, we have the structure to refine it.

influence.title: Influencer Marketing
influence.subtitle: Today, attention is earned with content, faces, and a credible story. Seder Music activates the power of artists, creators, and talents to give your brand strong visibility—and above all, real impact.

whatWeDo.title: Our action plan
whatWeDo.text: We design and manage bespoke influencer campaigns tailored to your product or service. From strategy to reporting, we turn talent audiences into high-performing content that drives measurable results.
bullets: Artists & creators aligned with your universe (music, lifestyle, entertainment, niches)
Production of high-performing formats: Reels, TikTok, YouTube, Stories, Shorts
Showcases, launches, pop-ups, "brand moments", and IRL collaborations
Organic placements within the artist's world: music videos, studio behind-the-scenes, live performances

ourApproach.title: Our Approach
ourApproach.text: We align strategy, talent and creativity to transform your image into impact — and impact into results.

steps.title: Talent Casting
steps.desc: Selection of artists consistent with your audience, values, and DNA.

steps.title: Creative Direction
steps.desc: Concept, scripts, tone, visual universe, guidelines, and validations.

steps.title: Production & Distribution
steps.desc: Filming, editing, scheduling, publishing, and coordination.

whatYouGet.title: What You Get
bullets: A campaign consistent with your identity
Clean and secure execution (contracts, image rights, deliverables)
Measurable results: views, engagement, clicks, conversions

items.title: Ambassadors
items.desc: Image and content over several months.

forWho.title: For Whom?
forWho.text: Brands, startups, institutions, events, hospitality, dining, lifestyle, luxury, tech, real estate, tourism… If you have a product to make known, we find the right voice to carry it.

cta.title: Work With Us
cta.text: Tell us about your brand, your goal, and your budget. We send you a clear proposal: concept + talents + calendar + deliverables.

manifesto.content: A musical project is built as much on sound as on impact. That's why Seder Music combines relationships, culture, studio experience, event expertise, and artistic direction to bring your event to life.

4) Activities & Scope of Services

The Site presents the activities of artistic booking, event production / organization, and associated services (the "Services").
The Services may give rise to quotes, contracts and/or general terms and conditions (T&Cs) communicated to the client before validation.

5) Intellectual Property

The entire Site (structure, texts, visuals, logos, brands, videos, graphic elements, database, etc.) is protected by applicable laws relating to intellectual property.
Any reproduction, representation, adaptation or exploitation, total or partial, without prior written authorization from the Publisher, is prohibited, except for legal exceptions.

6) Liability

The Publisher implements reasonable means to provide up-to-date information. However, the Publisher does not guarantee the absence of errors or omissions.
The Publisher cannot be held liable for indirect damages related to the use of the Site, nor for interruptions, bugs, unavailability, or contents of third-party sites accessible via links.

7) Hyperlinks

The Site may contain links to third-party sites. The Publisher exercises no control over these sites and declines all responsibility regarding their content, policies, or practices.

8) Personal Data

To learn more about the collection and processing of personal data, consult the page: Privacy Policy: [link to add]

9) Applicable Law & Competent Jurisdiction

Unless otherwise provided by mandatory provisions, these legal mentions and the use of the Site are governed by the law of the place of performance of the service (place of service).
In case of dispute, the parties will seek an amicable solution before any action. Failing that, jurisdiction is attributed to the territorially competent courts according to the place of performance of the service and/or applicable rules.

10) Update

legal.privacy:
Last update: 13/01/2026

1) Data Controller

The present site (the "Site") is operated by Seder (the "Data Controller").

Legal Status / Form: [to be specified]
Address: Jerusalem, Israel ([full address recommended])
Email: rds.event.production@gmail.com
Phone: +972 52-754-8759

2) Collected Data

Depending on your use of the Site, we may collect:

Identity & contact: surname, first name, email, phone, company.
Request info: type of event, date, location, budget, desired artists, logistical needs.
Exchanges: messages sent via form or by email/phone.
Technical data: like most sites, our servers/host may generate technical logs necessary for security and proper functioning (e.g. IP address, browser information), without advertising purpose.

3) Purposes

We use your data to:

Respond to your requests (quotes, booking, production, organization).
Manage the commercial relationship (preparation of contract/quote, coordination).
Ensure the security and technical functioning of the Site.
Respect our legal obligations (if applicable).

4) Processing Bases

Depending on the case:

Pre-contractual measures / execution of a contract.
Legitimate interest (security, fraud prevention, request management).
Legal obligations (if applicable).

5) Recipients

We do not sell your data.
We may share them only with:

Technical providers necessary for functioning (e.g. host).
Operational partners strictly necessary for your request (e.g. event providers, artists/agents, technicians), within the limit of need.

6) Cookies and Trackers

We do not use advertising cookies, nor marketing pixels, nor audience measurement tools installed by us (like Google Analytics, Meta Pixel, etc.).
Technical elements strictly necessary for functioning (e.g. security, sessions, server logs) may however exist depending on the hosting and browser configuration.

7) Retention Periods

Unconcluded requests: generally up to 12 months after the last contact.
Clients: duration of the relationship + reasonable archiving for legal obligations/dispute management ([duration to be specified]).
Technical logs: limited duration ([e.g. 30/90 days]).

8) Security

We implement reasonable technical and organizational measures to protect your data (limited access, securing access, etc.).

9) Your Rights

You may request access, rectification, deletion, opposition or limitation of processing (according to applicable law).
To exercise your rights: rds.event.production@gmail.com.
We may request reasonable proof of identity in case of doubt.

10) Contact

Email: rds.event.production@gmail.com
Tel: +972 52-754-8759
